{{anglosaxon infobox | name=Cwén | image= | caption= | people=[[wikipedia:Angles (tribe)|Angle]] | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[wikipedia:Heligoland|Heligoland]] | affiliation= | language=[[Old English]] | birth=c. [[wikipedia:5th century|5th century AD]] | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse=[[Eriol]] | children=[[Hengest]] & [[Horsa]] | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Cwén''' was the first wife of [[Eriol]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''. == History == Cwén married Eriol (then called ''Ottor'') after he settled on the island of [[wikipedia:Heligoland|Heligoland]] in the [[wikipedia:North Sea|North Sea]], in the [[Great Lands]]. Together, they had two sons called [[Hengest]] and [[Horsa]], named so in honour of their grandfather [[Eoh]] (since the names share a similar meaning). Sometime after, while Hengest and Horsa were still children, Cwén died, prompting Eriol to abandon the Great Lands and seek for [[Tol Eressëa]].{{LT2|VI}}, outlines '''10''' and '''12''', pp. 290-1 == Etymology == The name ''Cwén'' is in [[Old English]], meaning "woman, wife".{{LT1|In}}, pp. 23-4 == Genealogy == {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | | WOD | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | |WOD=[[wikipedia:Odin|Wóden]]}} {{familytree | | | |:| | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | |}} {{familytree | | | |:| | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | |}} {{familytree | | | HED | | | | | | | | | | | | | | TUL | | | | VAL |HED=[[Heden]]|TUL=[[Tulkastor]]|VAL=[[Valwë]]}} {{familytree | |,|-|^|-|.| | | | | | | | | | | |,|-|^|-|.| | | |!| |}} {{familytree | BEO | | EOH | | | | | | | | | | SIB | | VAI |~| LIN |BEO=[[Beorn (son of Heden)|Beorn]]
